verses.roman:
bahu-mūlya vastra prabhu-mastake bāndhila
ācāryādi prabhura gaṇere parāila

synonyms: bahu-mūlya—very valuable; vastra—cloth; prabhu-mastake—on the head of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bāndhila—wrapped; ācārya-ādi—headed by Advaita Ācārya; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gaṇere—on the associates; parāila—put.
translation: This valuable cloth was wrapped around the head of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. The other devotees, headed by Advaita Ācārya, also had cloths wrapped about their heads.
